name: Marjorie
descriptions: Marjorie is the head of the White Glove Society living in New Vegas in 2281.

Marjorie and Mortimer are the two conflicting leaders of the White Gloves and by default becomes the most influential member if, during the quest Beyond the Beef, Mortimer is ousted. She is not fond of being accused of cannibalism.
If the Courier has at least "accepted" reputation with the Strip, she will give him/her a formal wear outfit and a membership as a White Glove Society member during the quest Beyond the Beef.

PC Playstation 3 Xbox 360 Although Chauncey tells you to find Marjorie at the restaurant, she may not be able to be found outside of the members' section, making Beyond the Beef impossible to complete without an appropriate White Glove disguise. Very often, she stays stuck between chairs in the room.

topics.response_text: Oh- oh my. How unfortunate! And in front of all these people, too.{fretting - a little flustered}

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for someone who went missing here recently.
topics.response_text: This again? I thought all this was settled. I answered every one of that investigator's questions to his satisfaction and gave all the help I could.

topics.topic_text: The White Glove Society used to eat human flesh?
topics.response_text: Now didn't I already tell you that we don't do that sort of thing? We do not engage in cannibalism here under any circumstances.

topics.topic_text: Who did you talk to about the disappearance?
topics.response_text: There was an investigator who came through here last week. He'd been hired by a young man whose bride-to-be went missing during their stay here.

topics.topic_text: It's okay. I eat people too. You can tell me the truth.
topics.response_text: You disgust me. How dare you say such a filthy thing in my establishment? I ought to have you arrested.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> It's okay. I eat people too. You can tell me the truth.
topics.response_text: You disgust me. How dare you say such a filthy thing in my establishment? I ought to have you arrested.

topics.topic_text: Is there any way I could talk to the investigator?
topics.response_text: Why yes, I think so. If he hasn't checked out yet, that is.

topics.topic_text: I'm investigating someone else. A man. And he just recently went missing.
topics.response_text: A man? Well then this... well this can't be. Two disappearances in my hotel? What will people say?
I do, but one can hardly call it work. I think of myself as a caretaker rather than a common laborer.

topics.topic_text: Heck Gunderson said he was here to talk business with you. What business?
topics.response_text: What else? Mr. Gunderson and I have been discussing his livestock.

topics.topic_text: I want to join the White Glove Society. I was told I'd need a sponsor.
topics.response_text: Why yes, of course. The White Glove Society is the most exclusive club in all of New Vegas. Perhaps the entire world.

topics.topic_text: Would you be willing to sponsor me as an honorary member now?
topics.response_text: The answer is still no, I fear. You need to be the talk of the town, really. Think big! Your name should be on everyone's lips.

topics.topic_text: Caesar wishes to extend your society an offer of alliance with his Legion.
topics.response_text: Tell your ruler we have no interest in such ties. Caesar's Legion is a collection of unclean barbarians.

topics.topic_text: How is your new cuisine faring?
topics.response_text: Why it's splendid. Simply to die for.

combat.response_text: {Marjorie:}Mr. Gunderson is no longer a welcome guest at the Ultra-Luxe.
{Marjorie:}Nor is he allowed to sample the world-class cuisine of the Gourmand, New Vegas' only 5-star restaurant.
